Welcome to Tweezepy's documentation!
====================================

**Tweezepy** is a GPL licensed Python package for calibrating forces in single-molecule force spectroscopy experiments and these pages will show you how to use it. 

Development of **Tweezepy** happens [on GitHub](https://github.com/ianlmorgan/tweezepy) so you can [raise any issues you have there](https://github.com/ianlmorgan/tweezepy/issues).
